name: Sea Horse Fun Mania - Fun Land
name_original: Sea Horse Fun Mania - Fun Land
description:
Sea Horse Fun Mania - Fun Land
is an awesome little game that turns a bit of basic physics into an incredible amount of fun! With adorable graphics and sounds, garbage Fun brings into your hands the quest of a determined little garbage who must make it to the safety of a pail of water while avoiding nasty, though equally cute odds.

Collect stars and beat your own previously set records as you help the little garbage escape eminent explosion at the prickles of mean smirking cactus. Face new challenging levels while employing quick thinking and a variety of skills that keep enhancing as the game progresses. Never has physics been this enjoyable. Hours and hours of fun enjoy.
